tagline: Titanium app developed for justbooksclc.com members to rent the books from smart phones
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Rent-read-return
body: This application has the authentication & authorization, searching and renting books subsystems. This application allows a member of justbooksclc to search and rent books with a simple gesture. This application can be run on any mobile/tablet platforms that support Appcelerator Titanium.
